description: This file is a Vite configuration script for a React project, specifically configured for CI environments and containers. It sets server options, plugins, watch ignored files, and other build-related settings.

methods.name: defineConfig
methods.description: Defines the Vite configuration with environment-specific settings.

methods.name: loadEnv
methods.description: Loads environment variables based on the mode and root directory.

methods.name: fileURLToPath
methods.description: Converts a file URL to a file path.

methods.name: dirname
methods.description: Gets the directory name of the given path.
